file.description: Start Before Logon GINA and PLAP install logs

action.loc: %USERPROFILE%\Local Settings\Application Data\Cisco\Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client\preferences.xml

action.args: cmd.exe /C "copy "%USERPROFILE%\Local Settings\Application Data\Cisco\Cisco AnyConnect VPN Client\preferences.xml" "%TEMP%\preferences_pre3.0.xml""

action.loc: %USERPROFILE%\Local Settings\Application Data\Cisco\Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client\preferences.xml

action.args: cmd.exe /C "copy "%USERPROFILE%\Local Settings\Application Data\Cisco\Cisco AnyConnect VPN Client\preferences.xml" "%TEMP%\preferences_pre3.0.xml""
wevtutil epl "Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client" %TEMP%\AnyConnect.evtx
action.clear_log: wevtutil cl "Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client"

action.args: wevtutil epl "Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client" %TEMP%\AnyConnect.evtx
action.clear_log: wevtutil cl "Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client"

action.args: wevtutil epl "Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client" %TEMP%\AnyConnect.evtx
action.clear_log: wevtutil cl "Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client"

action.args: wmic.exe nteventlog where " logfilename='Cisco AnyConnect VPN Client' " call backupeventlog "%TEMP%\AnyConnect_pre3.0.evt"
action.clear_log: wmic.exe nteventlog where " logfilename='Cisco AnyConnect VPN Client' " call ClearEventLog

action.args: wmic.exe nteventlog where " logfilename='Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client' " call backupeventlog "%TEMP%\AnyConnect.evt"
action.clear_log: wmic.exe nteventlog where " logfilename='Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client' " call ClearEventLog

action.args: wmic.exe nteventlog where " logfilename='Cisco AnyConnect VPN Client' " call backupeventlog "%TEMP%\AnyConnect_pre3.0.evt"
action.clear_log: wmic.exe nteventlog where " logfilename='Cisco AnyConnect VPN Client' " call ClearEventLog

action.args: wmic.exe nteventlog where " logfilename='Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client' " call backupeventlog "%TEMP%\AnyConnect.evt"
action.clear_log: wmic.exe nteventlog where " logfilename='Cisco AnyConnect Secure Mobility Client' " call ClearEventLog

action.args: journalctl -S -1d -t acvpnagent -t acvpnui -t acvpndownloader -t acvpndownloader_major -t acvpndownloader_minor -t acvpnapi -t acvpncli -t acvpninstall -t acvpnmgmttun -t acenablefips -t acwebhelper -t acwebhelperplugin

journalctl -o export -S -1d -t acvpnagent -t acvpnui -t acvpndownloader -t acvpndownloader_major -t acvpndownloader_minor -t acvpnapi -t acvpncli -t acvpninstall -t acvpnmgmttun -t acenablefips -t acwebhelper -t acwebhelperplugin
log show --predicate 'subsystem contains "com.cisco.anyconnect.vpn" AND NOT category IN { "acdartcli", "acdartui", "acdarthelper" }' --debug --info --last 2d
